name: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six
description: Real-time action. Sping-tingling tactics. And the command of an elite multi-national strike force. Welcome to the world of Rainbow Six. You and your team are the last line of defense against a group of deadly terrorists. Choose your weapons and gear carefully and feel the intensity of real-life tactical operations. With Rainbow Six and your Game Boy® Color, the fate of the world is in your hands. Literally.
